name: Bulbasaur
description: A small quadruped with a large seed on its back, Bulbasaur uses sunlight to gradually power up its abilities.

name: Ivysaur
description: Ivysaur is a more mature evolution of Bulbasaur, featuring a bud that hints at its eventual blooming power.

name: Venusaur
description: Venusaur has fully evolved, showcasing a large flower on its back that releases potent pollen during battles.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander is a fiery lizard whose tail flame reflects its life force, burning brighter as it gains strength.

name: Charmeleon
description: Charmeleon exhibits a fiercer temperament and more intense flame compared to its earlier form, making it a formidable fighter.

name: Charizard
description: Charizard, resembling a dragon, is known for its majestic flight and its ability to unleash powerful, fiery breath.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a small, turtle-like Pokémon that uses its hard shell for defense while mastering water-based attacks.

name: Wartortle
description: Wartortle has a bushy tail and a sturdier build than Squirtle, reflecting its enhanced abilities in water battles.

name: Blastoise
description: Blastoise is a fully evolved turtle Pokémon equipped with powerful water cannons, making it a strong defensive and offensive combatant.

name: Caterpie
description: Caterpie is a small, worm-like Pokémon that may seem weak but quickly evolves into more capable forms.

name: Metapod
description: Metapod's hard shell offers significant protection as it remains in a transitional stage, preparing for its final evolution.

name: Butterfree
description: Butterfree is a graceful, butterfly-like Pokémon capable of swift flight and using its wings to create dazzling aerial displays.

name: Weedle
description: Weedle is a small, insect-like Pokémon known for its venomous stinger, which it uses to deter predators.

name: Kakuna
description: Kakuna is an intermediate form that remains motionless inside its hardened shell while it prepares for its dramatic evolution.
